meanings.definition: A small dish of food or a drink taken before a meal to stimulate one's appetite.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served delicious appetizers like mini spring rolls.
meanings.sent2: We ordered a variety of appetizers to share with friends before our main course.
meanings.sent3: The appetizers were so tasty that we almost filled up before the main meal!
meanings.sent4: The appetizers were like little bites of happiness on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The colorful appetizers looked like tiny pieces of art, tempting us to dig in.

meanings.definition: Something that arouses a desire for more.
meanings.sent1: The success of the first movie was just an appetizer for the sequel.
meanings.sent2: Her captivating speech was just an appetizer for the inspiring workshop that followed.
meanings.sent3: The appetizer of the new book left readers eagerly anticipating the full release.
meanings.sent4: The appetizer of the concert was the opening act that left the audience craving more.
meanings.sent5: The appetizer of the mystery novel was the intriguing prologue that hooked readers from the start.
